newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA - BUDGET DEFICIT 1.56 MLN LATS SO FAR.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA - BUDGET DEFICIT 1.56 MLN LATS SO FAR.

text.p: Latvia's budget deficit was running at 1.564 million lats so far this year, the finance ministry said on Thursday.

The ministry said in a statement that the deficit in April was 11.664 million lats, there was a surplus of 2.996 million lats in March, a deficit of 882,000 lats in February and a surplus of 7.986 million lats in January.
The cumulative deficit from January 1 1996 is 151.798 million lats.
